titles: Mr. Anthony Wotton's defence against Mr. George Walker's charge, accusing him of Socinian heresie and blasphemie written by him in his life-time, and given in at an hearing by Mr. Walker procured ; and now published out of his own papers by Samuel Wotton his sonne ; together with a preface and postcript, briefly relating the occasion and issue thereof, by Thomas Gataker ...
author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.
Wotton, Samuel.
Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library
keywords: Walker, George, 1581?-1651. --  Socinianisme in the fundamentall point of justification.
